pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This fast-paced aerial video shows a dynamic flight over the red-tiled rooftops of a city built on a mountainside. The camera swoops low over the historic, colonial-style buildings. The flight path eventually reveals a white church with a bell tower perched on the hill.
